name: Glauca
tagline: A firefox add-on for weibo.com. Provides in location bar information presentation and quick post.
body:
> Hi, You've installed a Firefox Addons Reunion Project Addon. The project aims to bring old but good addons back to mordern Firefox, yet ship some Chrome ones to Firefox. This is a 3rd party project and is not driven by Mozilla.

# Glauca

Glauca is an Addon for **Firefox** to display Weibo.com status in the Awesomebar. You could also post weibo status in the awesomebar with --post easily.

[Download From AMO](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/glauca/?src=userprofile)
